snippet: The decision follows a similar one from ESPN. Both broadcasters said public interest in 3-D shows was less than they had expected.
abstract: BBC suspends its 3-D programming plans, citing a lack of viewer interest in the technology that brings three-dimensional images to TV.
lead_paragraph: The decision follows a similar one from ESPN. Both broadcasters said public interest in 3-D shows was less than they had expected.

headline.main: BBC Shelves Its 3-D TV Programming Plans
